original_text: Neither Party shall be liable for any failure or delay in performance under this Agreement (other than for delay in the payment of money due and payable hereunder) to the extent said failures or delays are proximately caused by acts of God, government restrictions, wars, insurrections, fires, floods, storms, epidemics, or other causes beyond the reasonable control of such Party and to which it did not contribute.
gold_simplification: Neither party is responsible for delays or failures caused by events outside their control, such as natural disasters, government actions, wars, fires, floods, or epidemics. However, this does NOT excuse late payment of money that is owed.

obligations: not liable for failure or delay

key_facts: No liability for events beyond reasonable control
Covers natural disasters, government acts, wars, epidemics
Exception: payment obligations are NOT excused
